channel.title: Touchstone Christian Fellowship
channel.itunes:author: Jeff Miles
channel.itunes:subtitle: Teaching from Sunday AM service
channel.itunes:summary: Recordings of the teaching from the Sunday morning worship service at Touchstone Christian Fellowship. Tune in each week as we move through the Bible in a way that is both relevant and challenging. Touchstone Christian Fellowship is a community of followers of Jesus Christ. Our desire is to live out, in our time and culture, the teachings and examples he gave us, and to share his message of hope with others. We welcome everyone, regardless of their place along life's path. Touchstone Christian Fellowship is a nondenominational church serving the Sacramento, California area.
channel.description: Recordings of the teaching from the Sunday morning worship service at Touchstone Christian Fellowship. Tune in each week as we move through the Bible in a way that is both relevant and challenging. Touchstone Christian Fellowship is a community of followers of Jesus Christ. Our desire is to live out, in our time and culture, the teachings and examples he gave us, and to share his message of hope with others. We welcome everyone, regardless of their place along life's path. Touchstone Christian Fellowship is a nondenominational church serving the Sacramento, California area.
